mapper.select:
-- 웰스매니저 미관리계정 현황 : selectWellsManagerInchargeExcds 변경 -- 아래에 미매핑된 컬럼은 그리드에서 빼기로 함 SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT T1.MNGT_YM , T3.DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD -- 총괄단 , T3.DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD -- 지역단 , T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T1.CNTR_NO || '-' || T1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR -- 계약번호 , T5.RCGVP_KNM -- 고객명 , T8.SVPD_ITEM_GR_NM -- 상품그룹 , T8.SVPD_NM_ABBR1 -- 상품명 , T7.SELL_TP_CD -- 유형 , (CASE WHEN T9.WK_EXCN_DT IS NULL THEN '방문' WHEN T9.WK_EXCN_DT IS NOT NULL THEN '완료' WHEN T9.WK_CAN_RSON_CD IS NOT NULL THEN '취소' ELSE '예정' END) AS VST_DV_CD -- 구분 , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'WK_PRGS_STAT_CD', T9.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD, 'ko') AS VST_PRGS_STAT_CD -- , T2.NEW_ADR_ZIP -- 우편번호 , T6.RNADR || ' ' || T6.RDADR AS ADR -- 주소 , T11.CTPV_NM || ' ' || T11.CTCTY_NM || ' ' || T11.EMD_NM AS EMD -- 읍면동 , T9.OG_NM -- 지역단,지점 통합하여 센터명 , T9.PRTNR_KNM -- 담당자 , T9.CLSF_CD_SRN_PRNT_CN -- 업무유형 , T9.EGER_WK_YN AS EGER_WK -- 강제배정 , (SELECT DECODE(zz.DTA_DL_YN,'N','고정','') FROM TB_SVPD_CNTR_FXN_PRTNR_IZ zz WHERE zz.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND zz.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND zz.CH_SN = (SELECT MAX(CH_SN) FROM TB_SVPD_CNTR_FXN_PRTNR_IZ yy WHERE yy.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND yy.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN)) AS FIX -- 고정방문 FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ T1 -- , TB_SVPD_LOCARA_BFSVC_OGMGR_IZ T2 , TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T2 , TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T3 , TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL T4 , TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS T5 , TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS T6 , TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T7 , () T8 , (SELECT T9.ASN_OJ_YM , T9.CNTR_NO , T9.CNTR_SN , T9.WK_EXCN_DT , T9.WK_CAN_RSON_CD , T9.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD , T9.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO , T9.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD , T9.CNFM_PSIC_DV_CD , T9.CST_SV_ASN_NO , T10.CLSF_CD_SRN_PRNT_CN , T10.EGER_WK_YN , T12.OG_NM , T12.PRTNR_KNM FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ T9 , TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ T10 , TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T12 WHERE T9.ASN_OJ_YM = #{mngtYm} AND T12.BASE_YM = T9.ASN_OJ_YM AND T9.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T10.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND T9.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = T12.OG_TP_CD AND T9.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO = T12.PRTNR_NO AND T10.VST_DV_CD <> '20' -- 택배건 제외 AND T9.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD IN ('W03','W06') -- 엔지니어방문계정 AND T9.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO != '99992' ) T9 , TB_GBCO_RNADR_BAS T11 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.MNGT_YM = #{mngtYm} AND T1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD = '101' -- 정상건만 조회 AND T1.MNGT_YM = T3.BASE_YM AND T1.MNGT_YM = T2.BASE_YM AND T1.MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD AND T1.MNGT_PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO AND T2.OG_ID = T3.OG_ID AND T4.DTL_CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T4.DTL_CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T4.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = T5.CNTR_ADRPC_ID AND T4.ADRPC_TP_CD IN ('2','3') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN T4.VL_STRT_DTM AND T4.VL_END_DTM AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T5.ADR_ID = T6.ADR_ID AND T6.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.CNTR_NO = T7.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T7.CNTR_SN AND T1.PDCT_PD_CD = T8.SVPD_PD_CD AND T1.MNGT_YM = T9.ASN_OJ_YM(+) AND T1.CNTR_NO = T9.CNTR_NO(+) AND T1.CNTR_SN = T9.CNTR_SN(+) AND T6.STRU_MNGT_NO = T11.STRU_MNGT_NO AND T11.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND (T1.CNTR_NO, T1.CNTR_SN) IN (SELECT CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ T13 WHERE T13.VST_DUEDT LIKE (T1.MNGT_YM || '%') AND T13.VST_DV_CD IN ('10', '11') -- 매니저 방문건이 있는 계약건만 조회 ) AND T8.SVPD_ITEM_GR <> '11' -- 모종계정은 전체 제외 -- 물류담당자 제외 AND T1.MNGT_PRTNR_NO != '99992' -- 계정구분: 관리계정
AND (T1.MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD IN ('W03','W06') OR (T1.MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD IN ('HR1','W02') AND T9.CST_SV_ASN_NO IS NOT NULL) )
-- 계정구분: 방문계정
AND T9.CST_SV_ASN_NO IS NOT NULL AND T1.MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD IN ('HR1','W02')
-- 웰스팜 제외
AND T8.SVPD_ITEM_GR <> '92'
AND T3.DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID = #{dgr1LevlOgId}
AND T3.DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID = #{dgr2LevlOgId}
) T WHERE 1=1 -- 강제배정 제외 (강제배정, 고정등록 제외는 select 묶어서 바깥에서 처리)
AND T.EGER_WK != 'Y'
-- 고정배정 제외
AND T.FIX IS NULL
ORDER BY T.DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD ASC, T.DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD ASC
